notes:
## What's Changed

### License Update

* LICENSE: switch to MIT by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/462

### New Features

* Feature: fdbased open fd with offset by @myloft in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/272
* Feature: Add support for multicast by @Amaindex in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/245
* Feature: persistent wintun with GUID option by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/301
* Feature: set open FD offset for iOS by @hossinasaadi in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/418
* Feature: add make for loong64 by @xunmi-git in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/427
* Feature(proxy): support gost relay protocol by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/310
* Feature(docker): add options for multicast groups by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/290
* Feature(socks5): support abstract namespace unix sock by @SuzukiHonoka in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/436

### Improvement & Fixes

* Improve(actions): add concurrency groups by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/289
* Improve: use embedded `go-shadowsocks2` by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/306
* Improve(proxy/ss): allow explicit none cipher mode by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/312
* Improve: optimize the memory footprint under SOCKS5 when USERNAME/PASSWORD authentication is used by @cty123 in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/315
* Fix: defer func for `safeConnClose` by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/309
* Fix: call SetSendBufferSize when setting send buffer size option by @niconorsk in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/336
* Fix: safely split command strings by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/340
* Fix: socks5 usernames and passwords can BOTH be up to 255 bytes by @Yawning in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/343
* Fix: codeql autobuild error by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/355
* Fix: mutex never unlocked on error by @devil666face in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/456
* Refactor: direct proxy parsing by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/308
* Refactor(debug): simplify version string by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/380
* Refactor(log): use `go.uber.org/zap` by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/389
* Refactor(tunnel): modularize tunnel pkg by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/393
* Refactor(core): replace net.IP with netip.Addr by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/395
* Refactor(metadata): replace net.IP with netip.Addr by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/396
* Refactor(socks): replace net.IP with netip.Addr by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/397
* Refactor(pool): move to internal by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/398
* Refactor(pool): use generic buffer/pool by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/399
* Refactor: bufferpool new function by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/407
* Refactor(dialer): use `DefaultDialer` by @xjasonlyu in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/465

## New Contributors

* @Amaindex made their first contribution in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/245
* @cty123 made their first contribution in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/315
* @niconorsk made their first contribution in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/336
* @Yawning made their first contribution in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/343
* @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/370
* @hossinasaadi made their first contribution in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/418
* @xunmi-git made their first contribution in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/427
* @SuzukiHonoka made their first contribution in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/436
* @devil666face made their first contribution in https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/pull/456

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/xjasonlyu/tun2socks/compare/v2.5.2...v2.6.0
